betterquesting:10.desc:8: Occasionally as you are exploring, you may find the §c§osludge plains§r. These mud ridden plains hold a large, overridden dungeon in their centers. However, these towers are protected by the blessing of the §4§oPrimordial Malevolence §rand will not allow you in without having defeated it first. Once you have access to the tower, light a fire on the 4 braziers on top to begin your perilous descent.
